in version box there isn't 1.0.0.6. I use jstl 1.0.0.6 and jvm sun 1.4.2 on my linux box. I have this small snippet: <%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="/WEB-INF/tld/c.tld" %> <%@ taglib prefix="fmt" uri="/WEB-INF/tld/fmt.tld" %> <%@ taglib prefix="sql" uri="/WEB-INF/tld/sql.tld" %> bug fmt

We need reset contentType response.setContentType("text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1"); %> it work fine
